          <title>
            <string language="en">The sun and the moon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Sonne und der Mond</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le soleil et la lune</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O sol e a lua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il sole e la luna</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο ήλιος και το φεγγάρι</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El sol y la luna</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the relative sizes and positions of the Sun and the Moon from the Earth.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Moon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solar system</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sun</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die relativen Größen und 
die Positionen der Sonne und des Mondes von der Masse.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les tailles et les 
positions relatives du soleil et de la lune de la terre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra os tamanhos e as 
posições relativos do sol e da lua da terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra i formati e le 
posizioni relativi del sole e della luna dalla terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τα σχετικές μεγέθη και 
θέσεις του ήλιου και του φεγγαριού από τη γη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra las tallas y las 
posiciones relativas del sol y de la luna de la tierra.</string>
          </description>
